H0.text: The film '10 things I hate about you', was inspired by which of Shakespeare's plays. A Midsummer Night's Dream

H1.text: The film '10 things I hate about you', was inspired by which of Shakespeare's plays. The Taming of the Shrew

H2.text: The film '10 things I hate about you', was inspired by which of Shakespeare's plays. Romeo and Juliet

H3.text: The film '10 things I hate about you', was inspired by which of Shakespeare's plays. TTOTS

A4.text: The 1999 high-school comedy film 10 Things I Hate About You and the 2003 romantic comedy Deliver Us from Eva are also loosely based on the play.

A5.text: The screenplay by Karen McCullah Lutz and Kirsten Smith is a modernization of William Shakespeare's comedy The Taming of the Shrew, retold in a late-1990s American high school setting.

A6.text: Writing duo Karen McCullah Lutz and Kirsten Smith were inspired to write 10 Things I Hate About You after watching Clueless (1995)... eventually settling on The Taming of the Shrew, a comedy by William Shakespeare.
